judicialResults.label: Unpaid work. Requirement to be completed within 12 months.

UPWR - Unpaid work. Requirement to be completed within 12 months.
Unpaid Work Requirement: Carry out unpaid work for 5 Hours within the next twelve months. This work will be supervised by the responsible officer.
